name: Kunal Shah
profile_summary: Kunal Shah is the Founder of CRED and is known for his curiosity-driven approach to entrepreneurship.

posts.content: Kunal Shah discusses the concept of a growth mindset, categorizing it into five tiers: those who seek feedback to improve, those who receive feedback with grace, those who receive feedback but keep defending, those who never seek feedback, and those who repel feedback. The post received 2,510 likes, 233 comments, and 64 reposts.
posts.summary: Growth mindset categorized into five tiers based on feedback reception.

posts.content: Kunal Shah wishes everyone a prosperous 2026 filled with optimism and free from envy and negativity. This post garnered 1,804 likes, 83 comments, and 8 reposts.
posts.summary: New Year wishes for a prosperous 2026 with optimism.

posts.content: Kunal Shah reflects on how societies rooted in emotions rather than data tend to demonize those who bring data. The post has received 2,429 likes, 187 comments, and 64 reposts.
posts.summary: Societal reflection on data versus emotion-driven perspectives.

experience: Kunal Shah has held multiple roles including Independent Director at Syrma SGS Technology Limited since Nov 2021; Founder at CRED since Apr 2018; Advisor To The Board at Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd. (Times Group) since Oct 2017; Advisor at AngelList since Jan 2018; Investor in multiple companies since Jan 2016.
skills: Kunal Shah's LinkedIn profile lists skills such as Marketing Strategy with endorsements from Praveen BABU and others; Entrepreneurship endorsed by Ajeet Khurana among others. There are a total of 46 skills listed.
